subject: Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Biathlon
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Four years ago at Vancouver, the South Koreans finished first but were disqualified. This time the women’s short-track relay team won gold with a dramatic last-lap pass of China.
snippet: Four years ago at Vancouver, the South Koreans finished first but were disqualified. This time the women’s short-track relay team won gold with a dramatic last-lap pass of China.
